entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:41 PM MDT Sunday 23 April 2023
